Deprecated API

Contents

  • Interfaces
  • Classes
  • Methods
  • Interfaces 
    Interface Description
    org.apache.activemq.store.jdbc.DatabaseLocker
    As of 5.7.0, use more general Locker instead
  • Classes 
    Class Description
    org.apache.activemq.store.jdbc.JDBCIOExceptionHandler
    org.apache.activemq.thread.DefaultThreadPools
    do not use this class. Instead use TaskRunnerFactory
    org.apache.activemq.transport.reliable.ReliableTransport  
    org.apache.activemq.transport.udp.UdpTransportFactory  
    org.apache.activemq.transport.udp.UdpTransportServer  
  • Methods 
    Method Description
    org.apache.activemq.broker.jmx.ProducerView.isDispatchAsync()
    org.apache.activemq.broker.jmx.ProducerViewMBean.isDispatchAsync()
    This value is no longer used for producers.
    org.apache.activemq.broker.region.policy.PolicyEntry.getInactiveTimoutBeforeGC()
    use getInactiveTimeoutBeforeGC instead.
    org.apache.activemq.broker.region.policy.PolicyEntry.setInactiveTimoutBeforeGC​(long)
    use getInactiveTimeoutBeforeGC instead.
    org.apache.activemq.broker.region.virtual.CompositeDestination.isCopyMessage()
    org.apache.activemq.broker.region.virtual.CompositeDestination.setCopyMessage​(boolean)
    this option will be removed in a later release, message are always copied.
    org.apache.activemq.network.NetworkBridgeConfiguration.isUseVirtualDestSus()
    org.apache.activemq.network.NetworkBridgeFactory.createBridge​(NetworkBridgeConfiguration, Transport, Transport, NetworkBridgeListener)
    org.apache.activemq.ra.ActiveMQConnectionRequestInfo.getInputStreamPrefetch()
    org.apache.activemq.ra.ActiveMQConnectionSupport.getInputStreamPrefetch()
    org.apache.activemq.selector.SimpleCharStream.getColumn()
    org.apache.activemq.selector.SimpleCharStream.getLine()
    org.apache.activemq.store.jdbc.adapter.DefaultJDBCAdapter.setBatchStatments​(boolean)  
    org.apache.activemq.store.jdbc.JDBCPersistenceAdapter.getDatabaseLocker()
    as of 5.7.0, replaced by LockableServiceSupport.getLocker()
    org.apache.activemq.store.jdbc.JDBCPersistenceAdapter.setDatabaseLocker​(Locker)
    as of 5.7.0, replaced by LockableServiceSupport.setLocker(org.apache.activemq.broker.Locker)
    org.apache.activemq.store.jdbc.JDBCPersistenceAdapter.setLockAcquireSleepInterval​(long)
    use Locker.setLockAcquireSleepInterval(long) instead millisecond interval between lock acquire attempts, applied to newly created DefaultDatabaseLocker not applied if DataBaseLocker is injected.
    org.apache.activemq.store.jdbc.JDBCPersistenceAdapter.setUseDatabaseLock​(boolean)
    use LockableServiceSupport.setUseLock(boolean) instead Sets whether or not an exclusive database lock should be used to enable JDBC Master/Slave. Enabled by default.
    org.apache.activemq.store.kahadb.KahaDBPersistenceAdapter.isEnableJournalDiskSyncs()
    use KahaDBPersistenceAdapter.getJournalDiskSyncStrategy() instead
    org.apache.activemq.store.kahadb.KahaDBPersistenceAdapter.setDatabaseLockedWaitDelay​(int)
    use Locker.setLockAcquireSleepInterval(long) instead
    org.apache.activemq.store.kahadb.KahaDBPersistenceAdapter.setEnableJournalDiskSyncs​(boolean)
    use KahaDBPersistenceAdapter.setJournalDiskSyncStrategy(java.lang.String) instead
    org.apache.activemq.store.kahadb.MessageDatabase.isEnableJournalDiskSyncs()
    use MessageDatabase.getJournalDiskSyncStrategyEnum() or MessageDatabase.getJournalDiskSyncStrategy() instead
    org.apache.activemq.store.kahadb.MessageDatabase.setEnableJournalDiskSyncs​(boolean)
    use MessageDatabase.setEnableJournalDiskSyncs(boolean) instead
    org.apache.activemq.thread.DefaultThreadPools.getDefaultTaskRunnerFactory()
